# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    result = ""
    current_width = 0

    for word in words
        if current_width + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            current_width = 0
            result *= "\n"
        end
        result *= " " * word
        current_width += length(word) + 1
    end

    return result
end

# Test the function
println(wrap_string("This is a really long string that needs to be wrapped onto multiple lines"))
```
